formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu dieser Funktion in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about function 'CURL' =-
[Syntax] CURL(url[|post-data])
[Synopsis] Retrieves the contents of a URL
[Description] url - URL to retrieve post-data - Optional data to send as a POST (GET is default action)

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.2 zu 1.4:
Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.4 zu 1.6:

para.screen:
--- in Asterisk 1.4 +++ in Asterisk 1.6 @@ -1,7 +1,7 @@ -= Info about function 'CURL' =-
[Syntax] - CURL(url[|post-data]) + CURL(url[,post-data])
[Synopsis] Retrieves the contents of a URL
